page.title: 06A Day in My Life
page.content: On a typical Thursday morning my radio alarm goes off at 7:00. I shoot out of bed. Then I make my bed, get dressed and prepare my lunch. I get myself some breakfast and pack my bag for school. At 7:45 I wake my mum up, then I make her some breakfast, say goodbye and walk to school. I get to school at about 8:40. We all go in at 9:00 when the whistle goes. In the morning we do work like Maths, English and Handwriting. After play we have French, then swimming or P.E. At 12:15 we have lunch. We come in again at 1:30. In the afternoon we do Art and Craft or Science. At 3:30 school finishes. I walk home, get changed and go out to play. I come in for tea. At 7:30 I watch Coronation Street then I go to bed at 9:00.
